sn9.4:1.1: Ekam samayam sambahula bhikkhu kosalesu viharanti annatarasmim vanasande.
sn9.4:1.2: Atha kho te bhikkhu vassamvuttha temasaccayena carikam pakkamimsu.
sn9.4:1.3: Atha kho ya tasmim vanasande adhivattha devata te bhikkhu apassanti paridevamana tayam velayam imam gatham abhasi:
sn9.4:3.1: Evam vutte, annatara devata tam devatam gathaya paccabhasi:
